The engagements of the such Advocates shall be made with the approval of Member (Admn): 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: (S.K, Patel) General Manager (Coord: ) To: (i) All Officers at HQ/ ROs/PIUs/ CMUs / Site Offices.
